title: Pytorch Freezes System
body_html:
I have a recurring issue with PyTorch - which is that training models causes very heavy lags on my system, meaning everything becomes choppy and the screen updates only between 2-3 times a second. This happens more in heavier models, e.g, ResNet, VGG,though it's still noticeable in less computationally intensive ones. I realize that the GPU use is probably the cause ,however I did not notice such things in other frameworks (Keras, Tensorflow). My System is quite strong - Titan X Pascal, Ubuntu 16.04, core i7 , 32GB Ram. This happens also when the GPU is underutilized, e.g, 4GB out of the maximal 12GB. I am using a recent version of PyTorch.
Has anyone else encountered this? Is this a known issue?
